Text:
Classification: Game Show
Genre: Celebrities | Comedy | Family
Status: Returning Series
Network: BBC One ( United Kingdom)

Would I Lie To You? is a celebrity panel game hosted by Angus Deayton. Two teams try to bluff their opponents with lies that just could possibly be true.
